name: Diana B
text: Wish i can give 6 stars! Toppings are all SO FRESH and you can add as many toppings as you want. Finished my pizza too fast so i had to order another one 😆 Staffs are VERY nice! When i asked what cheese donut is, they gave me and my bf two of then to taste.

name: Zachary Hedquist
text: The pizza was above average. Hipster hotspot. Environment was nice, employees were very friendly and it was done in short order.

name: Kent Rumble
text: Fast service, great pizza. Plenty of room for dine in even though they have restricted some seating due to pandemic.

name: Jessica Abel
text: Good pizza, mostly friendly service. Today was good. Occasionally one of the girls isn't very nice. Really tasty crust. Would really like to see ground beef crumbles instead of just giant meatballs.

name: Thatcher Imboden
text: Bad service from decent chain. Online order wasn’t ready - no biggie - but they said it would be ready soon. Meanwhile in person orders come in and get served and I’ve been waiting a while. At 15m past my pick up time they tell me 5m more. …More

name: Sonja Perez
text: I went to this restaurant because it was close to my hotel and the reviews on trip advisor were good. It was very good. Pick out your own ingredients so it’s perfect for you. I added a little goat cheese for an extra boost of flavor. …More

name: Flip Acre
text: DoorDash masters. Even when it's multiple pizzas they get every one done before delivery arrives. Plus customers seem especially excited to receive a pizza from this restaurant. Delivering from this place for DoorDash has a high likelihood …More

name: Kody Lukens
text: Absolutey delicious. Better than MOD

name: Ethan Garcia
text: There's a lot to be said about going down the line "subway style" and picking all your ingredients for your own pizza... just brilliant! …More

name: Dani Grace Dufour
text: Amazing place to eat! Very awesome gluten free choices. Thank you blaze pizza for doing that :)

name: Rob Brewer
text: Usually a pretty decent experience. Not sure what was up tonight, but what was clearly a half and half pizza for me and my daughter wasn't sliced on the visual line dividing the two, it wasn't even cut all the way through, and it was served …More

name: Genevieve Fisher
text: We love Blaze Pizza!  My fiancé and I stop at this location every chance we get, whenever we are driving through Spokane.  Always delicious and the service is great!  Highly recommend.  Also I love that they have keto options!

name: Alex Popovich
text: Love that they make their Gluten Free dough in house!

name: Timothy Yaeger
text: Pretty tasty. The staff was quick. The restaurant was clean and tidy.

name: Jimmy
text: Ordered a pizza and "dough knots" through Postmates. This was the first time I tried their pizza, and it is excellent. I'll be sure to be back! Thanks!!!

name: Gunter Herd
text: Every time I'm coming through Spokane I always stopped by Blaze Pizza at least once every trip. The Keto crust here is fantastic

name: Jodi Lytle
text: Love blaze thin crust and picking all your favorite toppings for a low price.

name: Ron Stephenson
text: Great pizza, great way to have a pizza, forget sandwich artists  now we have pizza artists

name: Ryan Murray
text: Amazing the smell was intoxicating. My fiance wanted Chipotle, walked past blaze to get there. I ordered a pesto extra cheese plus parm and gorgonzola. Sorry to say it did not make it long enough for a photo. Great crust.

name: Darea Woolery
text: A delicious pizza place! I've never been to a Blaze before. It was quickly served and made on the spot. A good amount of toppings to choose from if you like to "build" your own pizza.

name: Alex Smith
text: I'm not sure when pizza was invented. But these people reinvented how we consume it!! Great food, love the building. I'm not sure what they could do better (touch screen coke machine)

name: Jeanette O
text: Blaze always delivers. Great product. The staff seemed kind of overwhelmed on this Saturday afternoon (lunch) but did a great job nonetheless. Love the keto crust and the option to build your own.

name: Christine Pearson
text: This is an amazing pizzaria! You choose what type of individual pizza you want and then you customize it by adding toppings and sauces from their counter. Then they cook your pizza in front of you using a fire oven. You can then top it off with a custom drizzle. Highly recommend it. Great job!

name: Joe Wilson
text: Build your own pizza is legit and the drinks are worthy of a good tastebud

name: Ashlie Bryant
text: Top notch service and the best place for sandwiches, salads, or pizza. Don't miss it if you're in the Spokane area!I'm not too into pizza, but this place might change my mind. They have quality pizzas with interesting toppings for a decent …More

name: Chris Cashion
text: It's not a bad place for a quick, hearty pizza. They just have weak menu options and weird pressure to make a salad based pizza. …More

name: Beyonce Black St James
text: Yesssssssss so good  A dollars and 25 cents to build your own pizza very quick very clean

name: Maddie Gullion
text: dependably good, dependably vegan-friendly. great for a late night snack when no one feels like sitting at a restaurant. long day at a conference? pick up blaze and eat it in the hotel bed.

name: Gen Fiorino
text: Small basic pizza $ 7. Scanty topping. Little taste. Wanted to put sea salt and oregano on every pizza. Service was fast. Check out asked for tip starting at $15. Not going back.

name: Mr Doyles
text: Got the keto crust, was amazed how delicious it was.  Honestly, best pizza I've ever had! Would definitely recommend! Loved it.

name: Sai Guduri
text: Delicious pizza with lot of options. Prices are very reasonable and the staff are friendly

name: Phuong Ngo
text: In the new age of quick dining pizza, Blaze does a pretty great job. I have only been to Mods or Blaze for this style of pizza food, and I am impressed by the quality of the food. Both restaurants are pretty tied with Blaze edging out in …More

name: Rusty Ford
text: Fresh ingredients, friendly staff,  quick service and a great atmosphere. I always choose the build your own option but you can customize any of the specialty pizzas as well! The fresh lemonade is always great as well.

name: Mario Cabrera
text: Real good I'm going back

name: Allie Margeson
text: Cool place to grab a fast & fresh pizza. Interesting ingredients to build your own pizza.

name: ingrid L Ramirez
text: This place is yummy!! Their hot pizza red sauce is soo good!! They also have so many options for bread (gluten free, cauliflower, extra fluffy) I decided to build my own for $10 (gluten free bread costs $2 more) & it was yummy! They also …More

name: Chuck Ballinger
text: Fast serive and great pizza, leas than 10 minutes from order to pizza was ready.  Great for groups as well.  Parking is a hassle, but it depends on time of day.

name: Tadgh B
text: This place made my wifes night. She is on a very hard and strict diet and with the cauliflower crust and vegan cheese she was able to eat out at a fast casual restaurant. She even had enough for lunch the next day.  Also I love your garic knots!

name: Michael Hoffert
text: They asked what sauce I wanted after already starting to spread red sauce on it. The cheese only covered about 50% of the sauce, very stingy. My wife got the pesto sauce and they put so little on she can't even taste it. None of the 3 …More

name: Alex S
text: Awesome pizza place. It's totally customizable so there's something for everyone. Great wood-fired style pizzas. They also serve alcohol. We had a quick lunch here before catching a flight out of town and it was fast and delicious. I'd recommend this chain for anyone looking for a quick, tasty bite to eat.

name: Kim Noe
text: Food good but the atmosphere not good.  Music was blasting so loud I couldn't hear to have a conversation and I watched multiple people walk in and turn around and walk out.  I can only assume it was because of the loud noise.  I mentioned …More

name: Danielle Davis
text: Affordable custom pizza for all dietary restrictions. My family consist of a vegan, a vegetarian and a gluten free vegetarian . Great that we can all get that we kike and need in one stop. We will be back for sure. Staff was very nice and speedy service.

name: Victoria Eby-Bounds
text: The gentleman was friendly, usually love this place. I have been going here for a while. The food prep and container area was a little concerning, I didn’t add stuff I normally would to my pizza because there was things mixed with other …More

name: misty bray
text: Awesome keto pizza!!! Great food, good costumer service and prices!

name: jesse pierce
text: For a quick good meal. Eat here. Prices are good and food is even better

name: Jennifer Ahenakew
text: I just love making the pizza to fit my appetite.

name: Richard Fischer
text: Really unique setup for pizza. Like a subway but pizza, fast fired in about 3-4 minutes. New favorite place! First tried them when chipotle next door said their air conditioning system had been leaking into their food all day so they were closing early, so I walked next door to this pizza place and fell in love!

name: Max Hatfield
text:
Quite possibly the worst pizza I have ever experienced. A Tontinos pizza is far superior.
However the employees were very friendly and helpful, helping me to make my …More

name: Keith J
text: I enjoyed my experience at Blaze. It is a simple enough concept, choose a pizza that is pre designed or create one with ingredients you select. …More

name: DR Hertz
text: Gluten free and dairy free options! This is a great place to get a custom pizza. And if you are vegan or have dietary restriction it's a great choice.

name: B Juliet
text: Great pizza options but at least one pretty rude staff. It felt like an imposition to change gloves, and when asked to do so (while it was on the order sheet), the young man asked "why, did I touch anything you're allergic to?" Well, in …More

name: Kate Foley
text: Blaze is my family's favorite pizza place. We have several allergies and diet requirements. At Blaze the staff is always very friendly, helpful and patient. The food is always great quality, we have never been disappointed!

name: Ellie Christina
text: Went for the first time in a date. LOVE IT.  Pizza was great and the level of customization is amazing. I'm going to have to go a few more times to figure out what the best combos are

name: Katrina Preston
text: Nice place to stop at for a quick lunch break. Has some healthy options too!

name: Shandi Flood
text: As always amazing food and service

name: Rachael Boyd
text: Lots of options, more than Mod. Very friendly staff!

name: Gary Bennett
text: I love this concept. You pick what and how much you put on your pizza. And all for one price. If you get a bad pizza it is your fault as you are in total control.

name: kitsune kappa
text: Love their pizza   they have a choose your own toppings as many as you like  for 7.95  pizzas 12". …More

name: Travis Phillips
text: Decent food, Nice staff.  Little pricey for what you get, but not super bad.

name: Donine Planichek
text: It was horrible.  Paper thin crust (literally), unless you want to spend $2.50 extra. Which would probably make it a normal thin crust.  The sauce was tasteless.  When it was time to leave I had to wait for the worker to get off her phone …More

name: Jessica Groom Ruthford
text: YUMMY!! 🍕 BEST PIZZA. GREAT PRICES.

name: Michael Altig
text: Blaze makes it my way, I love spicy sauce!

name: Luke Hartman
text: Great customizable pizza. Baked right in front of you

name: Jennifer Kopperman
text: Amazing customer service. I love the fact that you can 'build' your own pizza. Add any topping you would like, no matter how strange, gross, or generic you want to make it. The workers never judge. My mother in law loves the chicken, …More

name: Nathan
text:
The quality of food is unquestionably five stars.

The only somewhat negative aspect of this establishment is their wait times …More

text: Went the Blaze before a concert at the Arena great pizza and friend and fast service.

name: Johnny Gomes
text: Always Great!! Great people Gunnar always awesome!

name: Scott Hively
text: Keto crust that doesn't taste like cardboard!  It's an extra $4 but it's worth it.  I'm not keto but I do like trying things and I would eat this crust again.

name: Kelli Hill
text: LOVE the pizza here!!!! We had "build your own" pizzas and my mom had a veggie pizza. Ours were great. The veggie pizza was not so much. 4 blobs of sauce, a bit of cheese, and a handful of broccoli and mushrooms...does not a vegetable pizza …More

name: Tia Overhoff
text: Excellent Quality Service. Always the freshest ingredients. It is definitely a pleasure every time we eat there.

name: Morgan Frank
text: Awesome flavors. Build your own for $8, anything you want on it and artisan style ingredients. Been loving their pizzas for 2 years and still do.

name: E36 420
text: $16 for 1/2 a pizza on post mates? I ordered a full pizza. I bet you ants wouldn’t serve me half a pizza in person.

name: Walter Hazel
text:
Love the pizza there. They build it exactly how you want it. The taste is remarkable. Staff are friendly and helpful. Overall an e
xcellent experience!!!

name: troy prigge
text: I always enjoy blaze pizza. Its clean, fresh and fast. My only critique is how toppings get spread on the pizza. Sometimes things are a little lopsided. As is the case with most build your own shops tho. They serve beer as well which is great for a hot afternoon lunch!

name: Rob Schaerer
text: Very tasty pizza at a really good price. Nice you can get whatever you want for just over $8 on a pizza that easily fills you up. I was hesitant about the price and quality combination, but was extremely pleased. The basic salad with …More

name: Ethan Unland
text: Great quality pizza. This was the second time I came here and it was a my. Better experience than my first. Staff seemed in a better mood and I kind of knew how to order and what to expect.

name: Barry Brumgard
text: First time there fast and good tasting pizza...

name: Robby Palmer
text: Some of our ingredients was not put on our pizza. Seems a tad expensive for what it is. I will eat there again and review and update my review

name: Kimberley Seitz, Ph.D.
text: The best place to get fast food that you can customize yourself! They have a significant number of toppings and you can go through the bar and select which items you want and the quantity of each. You can also have salads bread sticks and other items there too. It's fast cooking in the brick oven so you won't wait long.

name: Florence Roblns
text: Scrumptious pizza, salad & doughknots. . 1st time but went for JT. Ranch fundraiser. & Have found us great pizza place!

name: Leka Bogdanova
text: The BEST pizza in town. Love their service, the environment, great food with no additives and preservatives. Good customer service.

name: Shawn Davis
text: Great toppings and super fast. This is a great lunch value! The staff is really helpful and came through the restaurant asking if anyone needed anything. I'm also happy to report that it's nice and clean. Well done Blaze!

name: Catherine Eggleston
text: Ok, Building your own pizza, then cooking on a wood fire stove, sounds nice, right? Well, it would have been, if the crust would not have been burnt, seasoning would be added to the red sauce, and there were a full bar of ingrediants!  The …More

name: Mikail Pinette
text: Build your own pizza, build your own disaster. Either way own it!

name: Logan Huffstetler
text: Great service even when it was busy

name: Gooseman S
text: Good pizza overall with good gluten free and dairy free options. Quick and a good price to go with it.

name: Kevin Houseman
text: Absolutely loved this place!! If you're a fan of MOD you'll love this upgrade. The variety in toppings were amazing and the employees were great in making a lasting impression on my friend and I. We still talk about this place whenever we visit a MOD because it's just plain and simply better

name: Joe Dorosh
text:

name: Joseph Burch
text: This place has great tasting pizza. Very good price also

name: Bill Frederic
text: We like their approach. Build your own with unlimited fresh and high quality toppings for $8.25. Very fast [10 min from door to eats] and you are involved in choosing which and how much topping.  Limited but adequate beer and wine selections plus self serve sodas. The Pizza was superb.

name: Dawn Trussell
text: Very good pizza, the staff were friendly.

name: Aaron Hope
text:
Always get the build your own.

Please keep in mind that any pizza is a personal pizza if you believe in …More

name: Mike Garcia
text: The food was great but the service was a little on the bad side. The employees look and act like they don't want to be there.

name: A
text: Had never been here till today...  An awesome crew and awesome experience!  Super concept!  Order your pizza and it practically done by the time you've gone to the end of the line!!!! Super reasonably priced!! Will be back for sure!

name: Don ovan
text: Pizza was good but the lady who cut it only cut my mom's into 4 big peices and mine into 6, so I had 4 regular sized slices and 2 huge ones 😂😂

name: Pookie Princess
text: We go here weekly and it's always delicious. Plus the customer service is usually on point! Rachael is awesome!

name: Gianni _M8
text: economical, and the best pizza I have ever had.

name: Michael Davidson
text: Excellent service and great pizza, best on the area. Gluten free option, great fresh ingredients. Yes it's a chain but the owner shows he cares and spends a lot of time there to meet customers and see how his employees are doing. would HIGHLY RECOMMEND.

name: Chris Wojahn
text: Great to see restaurants cater to keto.

name: Tim Winn
text: Good pizza fast.

name: Nat Path
text: First visit tonight to grab family some take out pizza. Did online order and arrived 10 min later and was greeted and treated well. Amazing pizza for the price. The on staff manager...I'm guessing, named Dave was very courteous and offered me something to drink while I waited. Pizza was fresh and hot, order completed perfectly.

name: Michaela W
text: Love getting pizza here! It's so good and so affordable just got home from dinner and had a pizza and a drink for about $10. The atmosphere is easily cool to, awesome spot to meet up with friends!

name: Jubert Bird
text: Good pizza, great Price and have tasty vegan/vegetarian options. The employees are friendly too.

name: Robert Joyce
text: Love the build your own. At under 9$, it's one of the best deals you'll find in gourmet, brick-fired pizza.

name: Saad Jubran

name: Jacob Garcia
text: Excellent oven fired pizza, that's ready in 8 minutes. Great for quick stops and delicious pies …More

text:
The pizza was great, the customer service I felt was lacking at first..
Staff really came up to the plate when I addressed it.. Mixed emotions, but a good time all-in-all..!

name: Jaclyn Knight
text: Great food, great service!

text: Nice selection but they forgot to cut one of our pizzas

text: Not the best pizza, burnt and smoky taste that wasnt for me but others may enjoy.

name: Shanika Palm
text: Make sure you ask for cheese on your pizza, that's all I'm gonna say.

name: Kolby Brown
text: Had a spicey pepperoni and pineapple pizza, cooked perfectly and the mango drink was great.

name: Daniel Howell
text: Their pizza is simply amazing. As many toppings as you want with your choice of sauce and meat. Cooked it a huge flame and stone oven in minutes the pizza tastes amazing on the spot or even taken home to eat later. …More

name: Emily Schlittenhart
text: Always love blaze! Best pizzas and even have vegan cheese!

name: Keenen Waggy
text: Always good wouldn't be too good if your allergic to some stuff as they kinda throw toppings on really fast and it gets into other toppings although same thing happens at subway sooo whatever but the foods great kinda loud always get it to go because of this.

name: Hannah Dedera
text: Super chaotic and confusing for the first time going, but the food was super good especially for a gluten free pizza

name: Tim Renz
text: Great vibe. Helpful staff. Tasty pizza. It was worth the 5 hour drive to try it out. Off brand soda and drink selection was excellent.

name: Bill Oberg
text: Blaze Pizza is Awesome Great pizza Oven Fired Thin Crust they even have a build your own pizza option for around $8.25 and you can add as many toppings as You want.

name: Katherine Guercio
text: Excellent and quick service by staff. Wonderful fresh pizza and love variety of drinks. Only reason not 5 stars -- parking lot is so very small. Not easy to get in and out -- don't go at rush hour meals. Hard to her a parking spot. We tried …More

name: Loren C
text: Nice, friendly service. Good food. Love the high rise crust!

name: Tony Evert
text: Loved it. Spicy sauce is too spicy, even though I can tolerate a lot of heat compared with my friends. Had them mix it this time 50/50 with regular and it was perfect.

name: Elvin Fortuna
text: Good pizza at a flat price.  The crust is thinner.  You get unlimited toppings and you can build it your own way.  It's fast and convenient.  Use then Blaze pizza app and you can get rewards and offers.

name: Henrik Joreteg
text: Great gluten free pizza options where they actually know what contamination means for us with Celiac. Granted, it's a shared kitchen, but they do glove changes, smear sauce from a different bowl, bake them on something and cut with different pizza cutters.

name: Meg B
text: Somewhat slow but very good pizza with really great selection of flavorful toppings.  The chicken salad had a very small amount of chicken and the lettuce was limp.

name: patrick conroy
text: Good pizza. The $8.25 build your own pizza is the best. Service was quick n friendly. Recommend this place for all ages.

name: Ken Hasty
text: Great pizza it's my favorite in Spokane

name: Shelby Cordry
text: I love that you could 100% customize your pizza. If you are hungry you can polish one off or save half for later. If you bring little ones, they can share a pie. 6 slices divide nicely. Very conscious about food allergies. Gluten free crust …More

name: Cameron Gietz
text: Great pizza for a really good price. Nice fresh ingredients clean restaurant and bathrooms were clean

name: Troy Reit
text: You can't complain about the recipes because you build your pizza how you like it. The ingredients are plentiful and fresh, and you can get the staff to pile them on, if you like. I haven't had a bad experience here yet. It's not a great place to have s quiet conversation because of the acoustics, but the food is excellent.

name: Lexi Johnson
text: Yummy! Gluten free available.

name: Elizabeth Claiborne
text: Always good. Good food. Good service.

name: Damon Taam
text: Pie Day Special is awesome! Very, very good!! I will definitely go again. My new favorite pizza hangout.

name: Tom Ratliff
text: A group of us went there this afternoon after watching high school basketball playoff games. As we walked in we were greeted by a gentleman,  who spoke about the pizza menu.  He was very helpful and personal. The pizza was awesome,  fresh …More

name: Chrispy Mom
text: Vegan options! Great food, excellent price!

text: Literally the best and freshiest tasting pizza in town!! The only issue is we normally have tell them to cook it less, they over cook it to our liking. Still the best pizza ever!!

name: Michelle Westwood
text: The staff is extremely friendly, the food is fresh and delicious!!!  Highly recommend!!

name: Joey Sammut
text: The pizza quality here for the price is what really sets Blaze apart from the rest. For less than 8 dollars, you can load a pizza with as many toppings as you'd like. Seriously, sometimes I'm concerned that they'll finally cut me off, but …More

name: Kelli Bilderback
text: Food is great, but it was so noisy...it would’ve cool if there was a way to get sound absorbers or something. Good prices, tho, and very fast, even tho it was busy! The gal that helped us was very friendly!

name: Joel .Edgren
text: Always been my favourite pizza place. Absolutely wonderful tasting food with ingredients you can hand pick!

name: Nate Jessen
text: One price and you get an incredible pizza with any sauce or topping you want. They then fire it up in 5 minutes and you are ready to enjoy. The price is just right and the portion size is fantastic!! Every time I go I get something different on it. So many toppings to choose from.

name: Stephen Muma
text: Love this place!  You can order your pizza in person and customize it to your liking.  It's the only place I've found that offers  gluten free AND vegan cheese

name: Matthew Collinson
text: Visited Blaze pizza today and was blown away by the food as usual. After sitting down, I found that the owner was cleaning tables close by me. After a quick conversation with him I found out that even though this place always seems busy …More

text: Very good build your own pizza with options for salads and desserts.

name: Junichi Minakata
text: I go there probably twice a week. I love it

name: Shaun Burke
text: Love that they have plant based cheeses!

name: Elizabeth Powell
text: Delicious and fast! Very helpful that you can call/order ahead for take out. They will heat/cook the pizza right when you get there to ensure quality.

name: Angela Buurkarl
text: My favorite build your own pizza place. Wish they had wheat crusts like Pieology but better topping selection than Pieology or Mod Pizza.

name: Jesus DePaz
text: Good food, great staff and best prices!

text: Kind of pricey but tastey.

name: Silver Fox
text: Far better then M.O.D. Crust doesn't taste like a cracker and sauces have a more robust flavor. Do not get to choose pizza size though.

text: Quick, yummy food served with a smile.

text: I love the pizzas and the ingredients they use. However, everything they have is recyclable, and they don't do it. The cups, the silverware, the napkins could all be recycled. It's a little sad to see.

name: AJ Koenes

name: Kevin Bailey
text: Good Pizza! Fast service. Fed 16 teens and three adults in less than 30 minutes. Only problem... it is 6 hours from my house and it is the closest on the map!

name: Dan Smith

name: Tracie Talbot
text: Amazing. The service is great, people are so kind (good community), pizza is just out of this world and it gets to the table fast without a long wait. definitely suggested for any occasion.

name: Brolin Rosquist
text: Blaze pizza is perhaps one of my favorite pizza spots in Spokane. This is not your typical call and wait pizza though. Here you build your own pizza (or choose a specialty pizza on their menu) and then it is cooked and on a plate for you in …More

name: Bryce Morrison
text: The build your own pizza concept was pioneered in Spokane by Blaze Pizza, and allows the combination of whichever ingredients you wanted, rather than the factory approach (love it or leave it) of all the other pizza parlors.

name: Elizabeth Croft
text: Relatively cheap build your own pizza ($8.25), with a huge selection of toppings including fresh basil, ricotta cheese, artichoke hearts and meatballs. With so many options it is hard to go wrong when topping your pizza with unlimited toppings.

name: Craig Abbs
text: Excellent food, great choices, wonderful bargain. We are here almost once per week.

name: Ryan
text: My go-to place for great custom made fire pizzas

name: Sharon Cornett
text: Since trying your pizza for the first time last night I have been posting on every vegan FB page I can find and singing your praises to everyone I know. VEGAN CHEESE!!!! Tons of veggies! And....a separate pizza cutter for the vegan pies. …More

name: Chandler Jamison
text: My favorite pizza in town!! If eat there every day if I could!

name: Derek B
text: Definitely one of the top pizza places in Spokane. This place is great if you want to get something quick without skimping on flavor. I would highly recommend trying it out if you haven't already.

name: Adam Coulson

text: It was super quick and super good! The build your own pizza is great!
